metadata.synopsis: The backup leader is an extreme fallback - if all the other Zhentarim leaders are dead, the player does not have the chance to side with them here in the Guildhall - instead, this soldier attacks us on sight.

0.speaker: Trinoda
0.text: Hold it there! Bad time to come a-visiting, my friend.

1.speaker: Trinoda
1.text: This is Zhentarim territory now, just as soon as we've purged it of Guild rats. Nothing personal.
